department.ch: 地球系統科學國際研究生博士學位學程
department.en: International Ph.D. Graduate Program for Earth System Science

remark.ch: 1.上課地點：中研院地球所305室，2.限TIGP學生
remark.en: 1)Classroom：Room 305, Institute of Earth Sciences, Academia Sinica; 2.)TIGP students only.

goal.ch: 目標是讓來自不同領域的學生進行相互討論，展示他們的研究項目，並從同儕及資深研究者那裡獲得反饋。此外，藉此建立交流網絡，期望能促進未來跨領域的合作項目。
goal.en: Aim to have students from diverse fields to build up mutual discussions, present their research projects, and get feedback from peers and senior researchers. Moreover, to create networks, that will hopefully encourage future joint projects across different research fields.

outline.ch: 目標是讓來自不同領域的學生進行相互討論，展示他們的研究項目，並從同儕及資深研究者那裡獲得反饋。此外，藉此建立交流網絡，期望能促進未來跨領域的合作項目。
outline.en: Aim to have students from diverse fields to build up mutual discussions, present their research projects, and get feedback from peers and senior researchers. Moreover, to create networks, that will hopefully encourage future joint projects across different research fields.

gradMethod.ch:
1.課堂參與發問與討論Class participation and discussion：50 ％
2.文獻口頭報告 Oral presentation：50 ％
gradMethod.en:
1.課堂參與發問與討論Class participation and discussion：50 ％
2.文獻口頭報告 Oral presentation：50 ％

ch.competencies: 進階數理及專業知識能力
觀測模擬及分析推理能力
國際視野與語文溝通能力
專業倫理及服務學習之能力
電腦及程式語言應用能力

en.competencies: Advanced mathematical and professional knowledge and ability
Observation simulation and analysis of reasoning ability
International perspective and language communication skills

ch: 學院:限地科學院。系所:限地球系統科學國際研究生博士學位學程。
en: Faculty:College of Earth Sciences only.Department:International Ph.D. Graduate Program for Earth System Science only.
